title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 200.24 - Recordkeeping in city courts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 200.24 - Recordkeeping in city courts

State Regulations

Each city court may, consistent with the
provisions of section
2019
of
the Uniform City Court Act, maintain records of all criminal actions and
proceedings in accordance with section
200.23
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
200.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
